mapper.select: select terms.id, terms.title, terms.content, terms.cat, terms.createTime,terms.author,terms.uid, users.name,users.email,(select count(*) from posts where tag=terms.id) as count from terms LEFT JOIN users ON terms.uid = users.id where terms.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into terms (title, content, cat, author, createTime,uid) values (#{title},#{content},#{cat},#{author},#{createTime},#{uid})
mapper.update: update terms set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, cat=#{cat}, author=#{author} where id = #{id}
